text: Ani mhanu lagale ki jara amhi apalyasobata margadarsanace anusarana karu lagalo tara amace, amacya bhumi (desa) tuna uccatana kele ja'ila. Kaya amhi tyanna santa va suriksata ani adara sanmanapurna haramamadhye jaga nahi dili, jithe pratyeka prakarace phala akarsita ho'una calata yete je amacyakaduna ajivika svarupata ahe? Tathapi tyancyapaiki adhikansa loka kahi janata nahi
